description: Manage apps, metadata, and localizations across App Store Connect. Streamline beta testing, user/device administration, and bundle ID capabilities. Access analytics and finance reports, and monitor CI workflows with build logs, issues, and test results.

APP_STORE_CONNECT_KEY_ID.description: Your App Store Connect API Key ID (found in App Store Connect > Users and Access > Keys)

APP_STORE_CONNECT_P8_PATH.description: Absolute path to your App Store Connect P8 private key file (provide either this or P8_B64_STRING)

APP_STORE_CONNECT_ISSUER_ID.description: Your App Store Connect Issuer ID (found in App Store Connect > Users and Access > Keys)

APP_STORE_CONNECT_P8_B64_STRING.description: Base64 encoded contents of your App Store Connect P8 private key file (provide either this or P8_PATH)

APP_STORE_CONNECT_VENDOR_NUMBER.description: Your vendor number from App Store Connect (optional - enables sales and finance reporting tools)

capabilities.name: list_apps
capabilities.description: Get a list of all apps in App Store Connect

capabilities.name: get_app_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific app

capabilities.name: list_beta_groups
capabilities.description: Get a list of all beta groups (internal and external)

capabilities.name: list_group_testers
capabilities.description: Get a list of all testers in a specific beta group

capabilities.name: add_tester_to_group
capabilities.description: Add a new tester to a beta group

capabilities.name: remove_tester_from_group
capabilities.description: Remove a tester from a beta group

capabilities.name: list_beta_feedback_screenshots
capabilities.description: List all beta feedback screenshot submissions for an app. This includes feedback with screenshots, device information, and tester comments. You can identify the app using either appId or bundleId.

capabilities.name: get_beta_feedback_screenshot
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific beta feedback screenshot submission. By default, downloads and returns the screenshot image.

capabilities.name: create_app_store_version
capabilities.description: Create a new app store version for an app

capabilities.name: list_app_store_versions
capabilities.description: Get all app store versions for a specific app

capabilities.name: list_app_store_version_localizations
capabilities.description: Get all localizations for a specific app store version

capabilities.name: get_app_store_version_localization
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific app store version localization

capabilities.name: update_app_store_version_localization
capabilities.description: Update a specific field in an app store version localization

capabilities.name: create_bundle_id
capabilities.description: Register a new bundle ID for app development

capabilities.name: list_bundle_ids
capabilities.description: Find and list bundle IDs that are registered to your team

capabilities.name: get_bundle_id_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific bundle ID

capabilities.name: enable_bundle_capability
capabilities.description: Enable a capability for a bundle ID

capabilities.name: disable_bundle_capability
capabilities.description: Disable a capability for a bundle ID

capabilities.name: list_devices
capabilities.description: Get a list of all devices registered to your team

capabilities.name: list_users
capabilities.description: Get a list of all users registered on your App Store Connect team

capabilities.name: create_analytics_report_request
capabilities.description: Create a new analytics report request for an app

capabilities.name: list_analytics_reports
capabilities.description: Get available analytics reports for a specific report request

capabilities.name: list_analytics_report_segments
capabilities.description: Get segments for a specific analytics report (contains download URLs)

capabilities.name: download_analytics_report_segment
capabilities.description: Download data from an analytics report segment URL

capabilities.name: list_schemes
capabilities.description: List all available schemes in an Xcode project or workspace

capabilities.name: list_workflows
capabilities.description: List all App Store Connect workflows (CI products) and their associated apps

capabilities.name: list_build_runs
capabilities.description: List build runs for a specific workflow/CI product, including git commit information

capabilities.name: list_ci_build_actions
capabilities.description: List build actions (analyze, build, test, archive) for a specific build run

capabilities.name: get_ci_build_action
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific build action

capabilities.name: list_ci_issues
capabilities.description: List issues and errors from a build run or build action

capabilities.name: list_ci_test_results
capabilities.description: List test results from a build run or build action
